### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE components (
  component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  component_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT DEFAULT 0,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE components SET quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE component_id = 1;
